data.name: plSendTo.Help
data.value: Enter the email address of the recipient of this message

data.name: plWidth.Help
data.value: Enter a width (in pixels) for the textboxes

data.name: plRows.Help
data.value: Enter the number of rows to display for the body textbox

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About The Feedback Settings

The Feedback Module offers authorized site users the ability to direct a message to a defined email location.  There are 3 Feedback Settings that control the display and action performed within the module.  

  • Send To – this is the email address where the information is sent. The email must be in a valid email format.  
  • Width – set the number of pixels across the defined module area for the body of the message text.  Note: be careful to keep this to value within the defined width of the panel where the module is placed, otherwise there may not be enough room to actually use the desired setting.  
  • Rows – set the number of rows of text available for the body of the message text. Note: Again, be careful to keep this value within the defined height of the panel where the module is placed, otherwise there may not be enough room to actually use the desired setting.
